alert.note: Alert for Daviess; Greene; Knox (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 17 at 3:26PM EST until February 25 at 4:13PM EST by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Indiana...Illinois... Wabash River, White River, Tippecanoe River, Wildcat Creek, Eel River, East Fork White River, Flatrock River, and Mississinewa River. .Snow melt and rainfall from Wednesday night through today of around an inch and a half to over two and a half inches on frozen or saturated ground is bringing widespread flooding to central Indiana rivers. Moderate to major flooding is expected on the Mississinewa at Ridgeville. Moderate flooding is expected along upper parts of the Wabash from Lafayette through Covington as well as Wildcat Creek, while lowland and minor flooding is currently forecast for other area rivers. Another system early next week could lengthen the amount of time in flood and produce additional rises on area rivers. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. The next statement should be issued later this evening or Friday morning. && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO FRIDAY, FEBRUARY 25... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...White River at Elliston. * WHEN...From late tonight to Friday, February 25. * IMPACTS...At 24.5 feet, North end of runway of Shawnee Airfield begins to flood. High water surrounds river cabins. Extensive agricultural flooding is in progress. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 AM EST Thursday the stage was 13.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage just after midnight tonight to a crest of 24.9 feet Monday morning. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
